title: Improve your book description with Publisher Rocket AI tools
description:
Writing a good book description (blurb) can be really challenging. Did you know that the team at Publisher Rocket has created an AI tool that can help you improve your book blurb? I played around with it and was really pleased with the improvements it suggested to strengthen my book blurb. 
Check out the free book description generator here: https://alexabigwarfe--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/5da9eaeda2e47/  and see what it can do to improve YOUR description!
